Package helper

Class AppointmentsDAO

java.lang.Object
helper.AppointmentsDAO
public class AppointmentsDAO extends Object
This class is the Data Access Object class for the appointments table.

    • AppointmentsDAO

      public AppointmentsDAO()

  • Method Details

    • getAppointmentsList

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentsList()
      This method creates a list of all appointments from the appointments table in the database. Using the getTimestamp converts to the local time in the application.
      Returns:
      returns appointmentList

    • getAppointmentsByCustomerId

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentsByCustomerId(int customerId)
      This method creates a list of appointments by the Customer_ID. Using the getTimestamp converts to the local time in the application.
      Parameters:
      customerId - parameter filters appointments based on customer_ID selected
      Returns:
      returns appointmentsByCustomerIdList

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(Appointments appointments, LocalDateTime startUTC, LocalDateTime endUTC)
      This method inserts appointment objects into the database from the SQL INSERT INTO statement. This is used to add appointments to the database and convert start and end times to UTC using setTimestamp.
      Parameters:
      appointments - appointment object
      startUTC - local date and time converted into UTC via setTimestamp
      endUTC - local date and time converted into UTC via setTimestamp

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(Appointments appointments, LocalDateTime startUTC, LocalDateTime endUTC)
      This method updates appointment objects into the database from the SQL UPDATE - SET statement. This is used to update appointments to the database based on the AppointmentID.
      Parameters:
      appointments - appointment object
      startUTC - start time converted to UTC
      endUTC - end time converted to UTC

    • deleteAppointment

      public static void deleteAppointment(int appointmentId)
      This method deletes appointments from the database using the SQL DELETE statement. Deletes appointment data based on Appointment_ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - appointmentID that get selected by the user from the tableview on AppointmentsForm.

    • getNextAppointmentId

      public static int getNextAppointmentId()
      This method gets the next appointment ID in order for the application to increment appointment IDs when creating new appointments.
      Returns:
      returns the next appointment ID or 1 if no appointments exist.

    • getAppointmentsWithin15Minutes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentsWithin15Minutes(LocalDateTime currentTime)
      This method is to find appointment times for the Login form check. This creates a list of appointments that will start within the next 15 minutes local time.
      Parameters:
      currentTime - checks the current time to reference against times for appointments in database.
      Returns:
      returns list of appointments starting within in next 15 minutes local time if any.

    • getAppointmentsByTypeForMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.scene.chart.PieChart.Data> getAppointmentsByTypeForMonth(int month)
      This method get appointments by month for one of the piecharts in the Reports form.
      Parameters:
      month - shows the appointments based on month selected in comboBox.
      Returns:
      list of appointments based on selected month if any and grouped by type

    • getAppointmentsByContactId

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentsByContactId(int contactId)
      This method gets a list of appointments by contactID to use for Reports form. Based on which contact is selected, this will return a list of appointments that match the Contact_ID.
      Parameters:
      contactId - selected contact from combobox in Reports form.
      Returns:
      returns a list of appointments based on contact id.
